title: How to Draw an Angry Bird (Emotions)

steps.headline: Start with the head.
steps.description: Draw a circle, but do not finish drawing the top of it.

steps.headline: Draw a rounded edge triangle for the top-half of the beak.
Draw a little hill under the top-half of the beak.
Draw a small upside-down triangle on the bottom of the top of the hill, and then another on the top of the hill.
Draw two half ovals for the eyes and then another pair of half squares, but color them this time.
Draw two bulky mean eyebrows, the tail feathers and a head feather to complete your angry bird.
Color it in as you like.
Draw a triangular shape with rounded edges for the body.
Draw slanted rectangles for the eyebrows.
Draw a couple of circles with smaller circles inside each one for the eyes.
Draw a diamond shape with rounded edges; draw a zigzag inside to complete the beak.
Draw a series of pointed curves for the hair.
Based on the outline, draw the details of the Angry Bird.

text: Red Angry Bird Start with the head. Draw a circle, but do not finish drawing the top of it. Draw a rounded edge triangle for the top-half of the beak.  Draw a little hill under the top-half of the beak.  Draw a small upside-down triangle on the bottom of the top of the hill, and then another on the top of the hill.  Draw two half ovals for the eyes and then another pair of half squares, but color them this time.  Draw two bulky mean eyebrows, the tail feathers and a head feather to complete your angry bird.  Color it in as you like. Enjoy! Yellow Angry Bird Draw a triangular shape with rounded edges for the body.  Draw slanted rectangles for the eyebrows.  Draw a couple of circles with smaller circles inside each one for the eyes.  Draw a diamond shape with rounded edges; draw a zigzag inside to complete the beak.  Draw a series of pointed curves for the hair.  Based on the outline, draw the details of the Angry Bird.  Erase the unnecessary outlines.  Color your Angry Bird!
sentences: Red Angry Bird Start with the head.
Draw a circle, but do not finish drawing the top of it.
Draw a rounded edge triangle for the top-half of the beak.
Draw a little hill under the top-half of the beak.
Draw a small upside-down triangle on the bottom of the top of the hill, and then another on the top of the hill.
Draw two half ovals for the eyes and then another pair of half squares, but color them this time.
Draw two bulky mean eyebrows, the tail feathers and a head feather to complete your angry bird.
Color it in as you like.
Yellow Angry Bird Draw a triangular shape with rounded edges for the body.
Draw slanted rectangles for the eyebrows.
Draw a couple of circles with smaller circles inside each one for the eyes.
Draw a diamond shape with rounded edges; draw a zigzag inside to complete the beak.
Draw a series of pointed curves for the hair.
Based on the outline, draw the details of the Angry Bird.
